name: Deconds
description:
This game concept was created during Ludum Dare 27, whose theme was 10 seconds. So i've created this small frantic game where you have 10 seconds to clear the screen by either typing or clicking the elements on it. If you win, you proceed, if you lose, you can retry.

I started this page mostly to grab some feedbacks and to give people an opportunity to play test the idea and contribute to it with feedback (if they feel like it at all that is)

By the way, this is an alpha version of a DEMO!

I hope you can all enjoy this simple game, and i will be more than happy if you can share your feedbacks. I intend to keep working on it, and if people like it maybe i'll consider making more stages and selling the end product either here or somewhere (not sure yet, your feedback would help me take this decision too)
